nodes.bodyText:
Armeria does not use @Nonnull since everything is non-null except @Nullable. You can check the detail definition in the package-info.java of the class.
https://github.com/line/armeria/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#use-nullable
How about just Creates a new instance with the specified {@link CircuitBreaker}.

No need for FastFailException?
I updated the doc.
